ticket.title: ActiveRecord::ObjectMap - Identity Map for AR
ticket.original-body:
I've created an Identity Map implementation for ActiveRecord. It's pretty basic right now, it's essentially a cache, but it works pretty well. I've written documentation for it too, and added some options to the find methods (:fresh, :be_fresh and :stay_fresh) to make requests be pulled straight from the database, not be cached, or both, respectively.
It's up in my Rails GitHub Fork under the object_map branch, so please check it out and let me know what you think:
[url=http://github.com/jamierumbelow/rails/tree/object_map]http://github.com/jamierumbelow/rails/tree/object_map[/url]

I've written documentation for it too, and added some options to the find methods (:fresh, :be_fresh and :stay_fresh) to make requests be pulled straight from the database, not be cached, or both, respectively.

It's up in my Rails GitHub Fork under the object_map branch, so please check it out and let me know what you think:

[url=http://github.com/jamierumbelow/rails/tree/object_map]http://github...]
version.title: ActiveRecord::ObjectMap - Identity Map for AR

version.body: The repository that Jamie links to doesn't exist anymore. This ticket can be closed, unless you want to re-create the repository and show us your work, Jamie?
version.body-html: The repository that Jamie links to doesn't exist anymore. This ticket can be closed, unless you want to re-create the repository and show us your work, Jamie?
version.title: ActiveRecord::ObjectMap - Identity Map for AR

version.body: I have heard core members say that this is not a goal for 3.x, but has been tried to be implemented. Jamie, if you could apply your changes to the latest Rails 3 and submit the repository again, that would be helpful.
version.body-html: I have heard core members say that this is not a goal for 3.x, but has been tried to be implemented. Jamie, if you could apply your changes to the latest Rails 3 and submit the repository again, that would be helpful.
version.title: ActiveRecord::ObjectMap - Identity Map for AR

version.body:
I'd love to be able to contribute... I posted this quite a long time ago and never got a response so gave up hope, and have subsequently lost the implementation. If there is still interest, I'm happy to have another go at implementing it. I'm much more confident in Ruby now, so it'll be good to see what I come up with.
Jamie
version.body-html:
I'd love to be able to contribute... I posted this quite a long time ago and never got a response so gave up hope, and have subsequently lost the implementation. If there is still interest, I'm happy to have another go at implementing it. I'm much more confident in Ruby now, so it'll be good to see what I come up with.

Jamie
version.title: ActiveRecord::ObjectMap - Identity Map for AR

version.body: This was a point of discussion at Scotland Ruby Conference and I think in many other places too. Please work on this.
version.body-html: This was a point of discussion at Scotland Ruby Conference and I think in many other places too. Please work on this.
version.title: ActiveRecord::ObjectMap - Identity Map for AR

version.body: While I like the concept itself, I'm not ( yet ) convinced it belongs to core. At least not without being a plugin first. Maybe you could release it as a plugin and get people's feedback from the Rails core mailing list - http://groups.google.com/group/rubyonrails-core - and we can see where it goes from there.
version.body-html: While I like the concept itself, I'm not ( yet ) convinced it belongs to core. At least not without being a plugin first. Maybe you could release it as a plugin and get people's feedback from the Rails core mailing list - http://groups.google.com/group/rubyonrails-core - and we can see where it goes from there.
version.title: ActiveRecord::ObjectMap - Identity Map for AR

version.body: Okay, I'll build a plugin that adds this functionality to ActiveRecord instead of writing it straight into the core. I'll update this ticket with the repository information.
version.body-html: Okay, I'll build a plugin that adds this functionality to ActiveRecord instead of writing it straight into the core. I'll update this ticket with the repository information.
version.title: ActiveRecord::ObjectMap - Identity Map for AR

version.body: Do make sure to post about it in the core ML as that'll see more eyes than this ticket.
version.body-html: Do make sure to post about it in the core ML as that'll see more eyes than this ticket.
version.title: ActiveRecord::ObjectMap - Identity Map for AR

version.body: Jamie, I hope to see your proposal at http://rubysoc.org/students soon :)
version.body-html: Jamie, I hope to see your proposal at http://rubysoc.org/students soon :)
version.title: ActiveRecord::ObjectMap - Identity Map for AR
